Articles.Content: I've noticed online a 3D printing company called Eucl3D, and it supports printing .craft files. I thought this was great, and wanted to print out one of my space probes. Then, I noticed, I use Steam, and I don't know how to access my .craft files. I've heard of how to do it on the standalone, though. Can anyone help me out here?

Same way as the standalone, really.  You just derp into your save folder and hit up the VAB or SPH folder.  You'll find the game folders under (probably Program Files(x86) on windows)\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program.
Try looking in /Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/saves/$SaveName, then in the VAB or SPH folder as appropriate.
I can confirm the above answers will set you straight.  Thats how to find them.

The others speak rightly. But if you're lazy, in Steam:

Right- click on the game in your Library, and select "Properties." In the "Local Files" tab there is a button "Browse Local Files."
